publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2585# Angus MacKay: The Colin O'Riordan Trust -That the Parliament recognises the outstanding contribution made by the late Dr Colin O'Riordan to the provision of access to music for all children in Edinburgh, and particularly Sciennes Primary School, and throughout Scotland, in founding the City of Edinburgh Music School and in the many youth orchestra activities with which he was associated, and congratulates his family on the foundation of the Colin O'Riordan Trust, which aims to assist aspiring young musicians by promoting musical excellence and improving access to musical instruments for those children who might otherwise not have the opportunity to pursue music.
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Rhoda Grant*, Irene McGugan*, Trish Godman*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Sarah Boyack*
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Margaret Smith*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Keith Harding*, Ms Margo MacDonald*

S1M-2585# Angus MacKay: The Colin O'Riordan Trust â€”That the Parliament recognises the outstanding contribution made by the late Dr Colin O'Riordan to the provision of access to music for all children in Edinburgh, and particularly Sciennes Primary School, and throughout Scotland, in founding the City of Edinburgh Music School and in the many youth orchestra activities with which he was associated, and congratulates his family on the foundation of the Colin O'Riordan Trust, which aims to assist aspiring young musicians by promoting musical excellence and improving access to musical instruments for those children who might otherwise not have the opportunity to pursue music. Supported by: Rhoda Grant, Irene McGugan, Trish Godman, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Brian Monteith, Sarah Boyack, Margaret Smith, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Keith Harding, Ms Margo MacDonald
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Susan Deacon*, David Mundell*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Linda Fabiani*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Karen Whitefield*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Robin Harper*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-2585# The Colin O'Riordan Trust (lodged on 8 January 2002) Ian Jenkins*, Scott Barrie*
